<h1 id="title" align="center">Kotdex</h1>

<p align="center"><img src="https://socialify.git.ci/iRevolutionDev/kotdex/image?description=1&font=Jost&forks=1&issues=1&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPHN2ZyB3aWR0aD0iMzY1IiBoZWlnaHQ9IjM5OCIgdmlld0JveD0iMCAwIDM2NSAzOTgiIGZpbGw9Im5vbmUiIHhtbG5zPSJodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZy8yMDAwL3N2ZyI%%%2BCjxkZWZzPgo8bGluZWFyR3JhZGllbnQgaWQ9InBhaW50MF9saW5lYXJfMThfMjMxIiB4MT0iMjA5LjczOCIgeTE9IjUuNzAxMDkiIHgyPSI4OC4wMDc1IiB5Mj0iMTMzLjg0NCIgZ3JhZGllbnRVbml0cz0idXNlclNwYWNlT25Vc2UiPgo8c3RvcCBvZmZzZXQ9IjAuNjUyNTg0IiBzdG9wLWNvbG9yPSIjNzA2Q0Q5Ii8%%2BCjwvbGluZWFyR3JhZGllbnQ%2BCjxsaW5lYXJHcmFkaWVudCBpZD0icGFpbnQyX2xpbmVhcl8xOF8yMzEiIHgxPSIzNy44Mjc2IiB5MT0iMTU1LjczMiIgeDI9IjE1OS41NTgiIHkyPSIyODMuODc1IiBncmFkaWVudFVuaXRzPSJ1c2VyU3BhY2VPblVzZSI%%%2BCjwvbGluZWFyR3JhZGllbnQ%2BCjxsaW5lYXJHcmFkaWVudCBpZD0icGFpbnQ1X2xpbmVhcl8xOF8yMzEiIHgxPSIyNC43Mjg0IiB5MT0iLTMwLjQ5MTEiIHgyPSItMTg2Ljk0NCIgeTI9IjgxLjU3MjUiIGdyYWRpZW50VW5pdHM9InVzZXJTcGFjZU9uVXNlIj4KPHN0b3Agc3RvcC1jb2xvcj0iIzU4NjVGMiIvPgo8c3RvcCBvZmZzZXQ9IjAuMTE1NDU2IiBzdG9wLWNvbG9yPSIjMDVBRkYyIi8%2BCjxzdG9wIG9mZnNldD0iMC45NjM1NDIiIHN0b3AtY29sb3I9IiMwNUFGRjIiLz4KPC9saW5lYXJHcmFkaWVudD4KPC9kZWZzPgo8L3N2Zz4K&name=1&owner=1&pattern=Plus&pulls=1&stargazers=1&theme=Auto" alt="kotdex" width="640" height="320" /></p>

<p id="description">Kotdex is a Kotlin library for creating Discord bots using the JDA with new experience. It provides a simple and intuitive logic for interacting with the API, allowing developers to quickly build your bots.</p>
